info.title: Moon-Service-API
info.description: Powerful Astronomical Data for Your Applications. Get accurate, real-time moon and sun calculations for any location worldwide. Perfect for astronomy apps, photography tools, outdoor planning, agriculture, and lunar calendar applications. Includes moon phases, solar information, lunar eclipse predictions, and location intelligence with support for 200,000+ cities worldwide.

get.description: Returns current moon phase with precise illumination percentage, moon position including altitude, azimuth, and distance from Earth, moonrise and moonset times with timezone support, supermoon detection, and visibility status (above or below horizon).

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City name, e.g.: London, Paris, Tokyo. Supports 200,000+ cities worldwide. Automatic timezone detection and geocoding included.

get.description: Returns information about upcoming lunar events including next moon phases (new moon, first quarter, full moon, last quarter) and timing for your location.

parameters.description: City name, e.g.: London, Paris, Tokyo
